name: PSW_HAZOP_LOPA_SIL_Ver Calcs_SRS_FTP Non SB
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PSW_HAZOP_LOPA_SIL_Ver Calcs_SRS_FTP:[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(PSW_HAZOP+LOPA+SIL_Ver_calcs+SRS+FTP_Scope)*>,Yes)){<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Documents_Sent_by_Customer)*>)+24+24+(2*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_PHA_Nodes)*>)+16+(0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_PHA_Nodes)*>)+(8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>)+(0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_PHA_Nodes)*>*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*0.25)+(0.5*<*VALUE(High Severity Scenarios in PHA Report (1-99999))*>)+(24+0.25*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>)+(16+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>)+(8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>*0.25)+2*(16+0.25*<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>+8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>*0.25)+(16+0.1*(<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>+<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_non-SIF_IPLs)*>)+8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*(<*VALUE(PSW_Number of SIFs)*>+<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_non-SIF_IPLs)*>)*0.25)) *>}{0}[ENDIF])*>
